attributes.action: Make Car Tax As Part Of Your Insurance and So Cant Get Insured Unless You Have A Valid M.O.T
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To make things logistically easier and safer for ourselves and for the police we combine the tax and insurance together in which you cannnot get insured without a vaid mot. Insted of displaying tax you would display an insurance ticket that shows when your insurance is up as well as tax. This would also make it easily identifiable for no insurers offenders. If the government controlled the ticketing this would reduce fraud.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
